This goal is achievable by using a document processing tool to extract the text and then summarizing the extracted information.
perception.local_reasoning: The initial query requires processing a document and extracting relevant information, which can be achieved through a document processing tool and summarization techniques.

- ['type=\'text\' text=\'{\\n  "markdown": "## Page 1\\\\n\\\\nEXPERIENCE LETTER\\\\nDate:\\\\nTo\\\\nMr. _______\\\\n_____________ (residential address)\\\\nPhone No: ________________________\\\\nSub: Experience Letter\\\\nDear ___,\\\\nYou have worked in our organization from ________ until ______ in the\\\\ncapacity of __________ within _______ department.\\\\nYour performance during the employment has been appreciated in\\\\nevaluations each year and your contribution towards the\\\\norganization have always been valued.\\\\nWe wish you all the best for your future endeavours.\\\\nYours sincerely,\\\\n__________________________\\\\n[Insert Name]\\\\n"\\n}\' annotations=None']
